introSection.title: About
introSection.description: Gataca is a cybersecurity company founded in Boston, MA, at the heart of MIT’s entrepreneurship and innovation ecosystem. It started as an academic research study seeking to reduce the risk of doing business online, at MIT’s Media Lab in 2017. As victims of the Equifax data breach later that year, the topic became very personal.
